--- title: "NARC-2" format: html --- ## Overview NARC 2 is the second HF station on your left as you enter the station. ### Equipment summary - FlexRadio Flex 6400M (HF + 6m) transceiver - Astron RS-35A power supply - Clipper PTT footswitch - Dell PC, dual monitor set-up - Elecraft KPA1500 amplifier - Elecraft power supply ### Connection scheme ```{mermaid} %%| fig-width: 6.5 %%| fig-label: fig-narc2-connections %%| fig-cap: "Connection diagram for NARC2" flowchart TD A[Flex 6400M] ---|Coax-Ant1|B[KPA-1500 Ant 1] B ---|50A PowerPole|T[Elecraft Power Supply] T ---|220V AC|U(220V outlet) J ---|120V AC|V(110V outlet) A ---|Cat 6|L A ---|Tx1 RCA Rem|B A --> N(Clipper footswitch) A ---|RCA|Q(Relay) Q --- R(Kasa Switch) R --- J A ---|USB|C[NARC2 PC] C ---|USB|F(Keyboard) C ---|Bluetooth|G(Mouse) C ---|HDMI|H(Monitor) C ---|CAT 6|L(Network Switch) C ---|USB|P(FlexControl Knob) J ---|AC Power|C E ---|120V AC|I(Kasa Switch) I ---|AC Power|J[Surge Protector] I ---|Wifi|K(NARC wifi) A ---|Power Cable|E[Astron RS-35A] B ---|Coax Ant1|D(Antenna Connectors) H ---|AC Power|J ``` ### Software summary @fig-narc2-connections below shows how these pieces fit together. ::: {.callout-note} These sections are generated by parsing a CSV data file in `include/csv/software_versions.csv`. The code is hidden in the output for aesthetic reasons, but may be revealed by examining the source code file. ::: ::: {.cell} ::: #### Operating System ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
software version date
MS Windows 10 2024-06-08
````` ::: ::: #### Digital modes ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
